sentences.en: At the level of the individual word is folk speech, including dialect and naming.
sentences.cn: 若用单词来解释,词语式民俗所指即“民间话语”, 包括方言和命名.

sentences.en: Cockney is the colourful dialect spoken in the East End of London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦方言是在伦敦东区讲的颇有特色的地方语.

sentences.en: He is currently engaged in dialect research.
sentences.cn: 他目前从事于方言的研究.

sentences.en: He spoke naturally, in Sicilian dialect.
sentences.cn: 他说话的神态自然, 说的是西西里方言.

sentences.en: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.cn: 他的叙述是方言和土语最成功的运用.

sentences.en: I can speak Shanghai dialect other than Cantoness.
sentences.cn: 除了广东话,我还能讲上海话.

sentences.en: I speak the Shanghai dialect and the Mandarin.
In his hands, comic jargon and dialect became a finished literary weapon.
sentences.cn: 在他的手里, 诙谐的方言,俚语成了完美的文字武器.

sentences.en: In the fifties, many Italians spoke only local dialect.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪50年代，许多意大利人只会说当地方言。

sentences.en: She speaks a dialect, not the Queen's English.
sentences.cn: 她说一口方言, 不是标准英语.

sentences.en: The appropriate use of dialect lent the novel great charm.
sentences.cn: 方言的适当运用给这本小说增添了极大的魅力.

sentences.en: The dialect is spoken principally in the rural areas.
sentences.cn: 这种方言主要在农村地区使用。

sentences.en: The proportion of the population still speaking the dialect is very small.
sentences.cn: 只有少数居民仍使用这种方言.

sentences.en: The use of dialect lent great charm to the work.
sentences.cn: 方言的运用给这部作品增添了巨大的魅力.

sentences.en: They began to speak rapidly in dialect.
sentences.cn: 他们开始叽里呱啦地说起地方话来。

words.tran_cn: 辩证的；辩证法的；方言的
辩证的；辩证法的；方言的

trans.tran_en: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language
